duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan and oversee the development of voice/collaboration platforms.
Develop strategic IT plan for voice and video services delivery.
Manage design and approach to access, security, continuity, and maintenance of all services.
Participate in disaster recovery infrastructure planning and testing.
Communicate architecture decisions, roadblocks, and timelines to stakeholders.
Define and deliver continuous improvement plans and programs for system availability and performance improvement.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in a quantitative or business field (e.g., statistics, mathematics, engineering, computer science)
